thread.title: LSSU Hockey wins first regular season game 4-0
thread.title_full: LSSU Hockey wins first regular season game 4-0

author: Shannon McGrattan
title: LSSU Hockey wins first regular season game 4-0
text:
Follow @shan_mcgrattan 
SAULT STE. MARIE â€“ Lake Superior State Hockey topped Northern Michigan 4-0. This is LSSU's first victory of the regular season. 
In its previous three games, Lake State had been outscored 15-6 by its opponents. This evening, Lakers goaltender Nick Kossoff had 19 saves. 
It was scoreless after one period, but midway through the second, C.J. Hayes put Lake Superior State on the board. Kyle Chatham, Owen Headrick and Josh Nenadal also scored in the win. Gage Torrel finished the night with three assists. 
On Thursday October 22, Lake Superior State heads to Michigan State for a 7 p.m. puck drop. Most Popular Stories Most Popular Stories More>>
